column4: knightwise: i followed your webmin guide and i'm in work trying to connect to it but ff tells me i'm connecting through a proxy and it's refusing connections, i can view google etc, is there a way to determine a good an alternate port other than 10000?

i'm in work trying to connect to webmin at home but ff tells me i'm connecting through a proxy and it's refusing connections, i can view google etc, is there a way to determine an alternate port than 10000?
